parameters.name: AccessId
parameters.description: The AccessKey ID of the cloud account.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the cloud account.

parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The username of the cloud account.

parameters.name: BindId
parameters.description: The ID that is generated by the system when the account is added. You can call the ListBindAccount operation to query the ID.

parameters.name: CloudCode
parameters.description: The code of the cloud service provider.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the data management center of the threat analysis feature resides. Specify this parameter based on the regions in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.
